Function: Specify the location of the THOR binary that is used for scanning samples (default is the binary from the same package)
IP address that the Thunderstorm server should bind to (default ``127.0.0.1``)
TCP port that the Thunderstorm server should bind to (default ``8080``)
TLS certificate that the Thunderstorm server should use. If left empty, TLS is not used
Private key for the TLS certificate that the Thunderstorm server should use. Required if ``--cert`` is specified
Path to a directory where THOR drops malicious files (see ``--store-samples-score``).
All samples with at least this score will be stored permanently in the folder specified with ``--upload-dir``.
Size of the cache that is used to store results of asynchronous requests temporarily. If set to 0, the cache is disabled and asynchronous results are not stored. (default ``10000``)
Thunderstorm will issue a warning when the queue for asynchronous requests exceeds this value (this indicates more data influx than Thunderstorm can handle)
Thunderstorm will create a per-host directory structure under this path that contains all stored samples (see ``--store-samples-score``) in the subpaths as they existed on the original hosts.
